title: I honestly do not get how this is toxic
body:
Hello, 

So i just recieved a 14 day temp ban after 1 game in which I know for a fact i was not toxic at all 

Game 1
Pre-Game
ancient evil: tf jg prettty spicy 
In-Game
ancient evil: bye - said bye to the enemy gragas
ancient evil: no sums top -
ancient evil: nvm - not toxic at all
ancient evil: i guess ill get camped rip
ancient evil: 0 ganks so far 
ancient evil: enjoy the repor 
ancient evil: yep
ancient evil: refusing to help 
ancient evil: good gank
ancient evil: ?
ancient evil: likewise
ancient evil: griefing jg
ancient evil: not really kid
ancient evil: i asked for help and u refused
ancient evil: so enjoy
ancient evil: muted/reported cya
ancient evil: toxic premades 
ancient evil: lmfao im trying to get farm and they keep harrassing me lol 
ancient evil: honestly dc if u report me cause i got chatlogs on my side 
ancient evil: whats wrong with u? im clearing the supers 
ancient evil: i dont understand tf im clearing out the supers at top and hes pinging me
Post-Game
ancient evil: beyond toxic tf
ancient evil: trying to help and you still harrassed me lmao 
ancient evil: also submit it to riot


Yes i did complain about not getting any ganks and was called "%%%%%%" multiple times by the twisted fater jg and told to "stfu"  other then me complaining once I do not get how this is toxic at all. afterwards i did mute him its funny how he can throw slurs at me and get away with it when i did nothing wrong here. I would love an explanation in how what i said is toxic. As i said im reporting him and gave him the reason why cause he asked.

Thank you,

replies.body:
> ancient evil: enjoy the repor
ancient evil: yep
ancient evil: refusing to help
ancient evil: good gank
ancient evil: ?
ancient evil: likewise
ancient evil: griefing jg
ancient evil: not really kid
ancient evil: i asked for help and u refused
ancient evil: so enjoy
ancient evil: muted/reported cya
ancient evil: toxic premades

^ Your were kind of harassing back, like it or not. Riot has a zero tolerance policy so it doesn't matter who started what, if you're part of it, you reap the punishments of it. I'm very guilty of this a lot. If you think something needs to be reported, report them afterwards. Nothing is gained by telling someone you're gonna report them. 

Either way, if you have this kind of approach in multiple games, the reports are gonna stack up and end up in a punishment because it is being toxic.

> ancient evil: honestly dc if u report me cause i got chatlogs on my side

Oof.

> [{quoted}](name=JÃ¶Zee ,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BV2bNcE9,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-11-14T02:23:53.866+0000)
>
> ancient evil: yep
> ancient evil: refusing to help
> ancient evil: good gank
> ancient evil: ?
> ancient evil: likewise
> ancient evil: griefing jg
> ancient evil: not really kid
> ancient evil: i asked for help and u refused
> ancient evil: so enjoy
> ancient evil: muted/reported cya
> ancient evil: toxic premades
> 
> ^ Your were kind of harassing back, like it or not. Riot has a zero tolerance policy so it doesn't matter who started what, if you're part of it, you reap the punishments of it. I'm very guilty of this a lot. If you think something needs to be reported, report them afterwards. Nothing is gained by telling someone you're gonna report them. 
> 
> Either way, if you have this kind of approach in multiple games, the reports are gonna stack up and end up in a punishment because it is being toxic.
> 
> Oof.

Thats snowflakeing and you know it.

The entire community of league is based upon 12yo childs (thats what i feels lke) who shouldnt be in the game in the first place.
Instead of adressing the issue, you punish or ban everyone who acts up against it .

But you dont resolve the issue, you just remove the visuals.

I know this sounds ridiculous -- but you should ask yourself if you would talk to a co-worker/family member that way. If the answer is no then you probably shouldn't do it.

What they say does not justify your behavior as your retaliation just helps ruin everyone else's experience.

Riot has the strong believe that people play worse when titlted.
Riot also rightfully  assumes that people get titled when they get annoyed or straight up harassed.
Therefore, doing your best to annoy or harass players and you definatly, at least, annoyed everyone.

You basicly abused the chat to make your own team play worse.

So you honestly got toxic yourself after you harassed your teammates. It's been said already, but I figure I can give you some advice. Even when life sucks terribly and there flying teemos  in your sights, respond with the best answer of all: Silence. 
Examples
"Random Jerk": No Ganks for you because you suck!
You: 'Silent'
"Random Jerk": Stop being stupid you dummy!
You: 'Silent'
"Random Jerk": Gee, you must be a loser IRL too.
You: 'Silent'

Saying nothing will definitely piss them off, but not any more than responding with an angry comment of your own. Itll also guarantee  no punishment for harrassment or toxicity. I know it's hard to hold in your passion, but when you do you are rewarded for it.

Calling someone a kid, announcing mute, threatening to report,  

0 gank, good gank, enjoy the report. - You on some drugs? Massive mood swing or was that sarcasm. lol

I don't know if this is a one-off, you might get away, but if these kinda game talks are consistent throughout, then this ban is a warning.

This is not about other people's chat or how other people acted, it is about how you responded. I'm guessing staying cool and just play on was not in your decks. 

Fair warning.

I never trust an edited chat log. However, i can at least point out what Riot would consider toxic for you. Might help to keep your account safe in the future. It was the little squabble you had with the person you accused of griefing. You told him you were gonna report him, called him kid, called him a griefer, called them toxic premades, said muted/reported cya. All antagonizing shit that had no reason to be said in chat. Chat is for strategy and teamwork. Not accusations, threats and insults.

And im just the messenger, so dont get mad at me. I didnt make these rules that police human interaction. I think its assanine.

> [{quoted}](name=ancient evil,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BV2bNcE9,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-11-14T01:52:39.785+0000)
> ancient evil: 0 ganks so far 
> ancient evil: enjoy the repor 
> ancient evil: yep
> ancient evil: refusing to help 

You reported your jungler for not ganking for you, and then made sure you let him know that. That's not ok. You were using the threat of a report as a tool for harassment.

I notice a lot of these kind of posts while relatively mild as far as toxic behavior can be defined as, all share the similarity of said poster being punished if they are having extended arguments or behave as such throughout the game.

> [{quoted}](name=Mcsquzzy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BV2bNcE9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-14T02:12:36.769+0000)
>
> I notice a lot of these kind of posts while relatively mild as far as toxic behavior can be defined as, all share the similarity of said poster being punished if they are having extended arguments or behave as such throughout the game.

If you want to put it that way, I have a simpler answer: They talk too much when they should be playing. You are right, op is not too bad some of them are flat out novelists. 

Even this particular log is more than what I would type in a week worth of game play.

Wow if this is considered being toxic people must get offended quite easily. Guess I'll have to just not talk cause it seems like people will get angry even if I say "hi" and scream toxic. 

People feelings get hurt so fast lmfao.

Idk if mods lock posts but if they do go ahead learned how soft the community is.

> [{quoted}](name=ancient evil,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BV2bNcE9,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-11-14T07:09:16.369+0000)
>
> Wow if this is considered being toxic people must get offended quite easily. Guess I'll have to just not talk cause it seems like people will get angry even if I say "hi" and scream toxic. 
> 
> People feelings get hurt so fast lmfao.
> 
> Idk if mods lock posts but if they do go ahead learned how soft the community is.

You come off as extremely sensitive in your chat log dude. So i would maybe not be the pot calling the kettle black. And its less about hurt feelings than it is about people wanting to play the game and not have to endure children arguing with eachother. I report out of annoyance, not hurt feelings. If Riot bans em, oh well. If they dont, i could care less because I probably wont have to play with em again and sit through their emotional outbursts.

> [{quoted}](name=Erol The Nomad,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BV2bNcE9,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-11-14T08:27:43.317+0000)
>
> Based on this chat log it looks as though you are the extremely sensitive one.  Almost everything you said was a negative overreaction, even if their behavior was worse than you described, yours was total overkill.  You need to chill out before you queue up, in whatever way works best for you.  Can't be getting this mad over a game, competitive or not.  Plus if you really wanted the highest chance of victory, you wouldn't antagonize the strangers you got queued with, whether or not they were worse to you.

Or you could just remove every none-skilled element that triggers even the calmest people to get verba-- oh wait --"toxic"

JUST REMOVE THE BAD SH++ already and the game gets a ton of a lot more enjoyable.

People dont act out for no reason at all, there is a cause.
Right now RiotGames deals with the result, never the rause.

And thats why "toxicity" as you claim it will never stop

> [{quoted}](name=Erol The Nomad,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BV2bNcE9,comment-id=0006000000000001,timestamp=2018-11-15T02:32:15.170+0000)
>
> I never used the word toxic in this thread.  I never said toxicity will cease to exist.  Who are you even talking to?  Next time spell check and make sure you're not putting words in people's mouths before you rage-reply.

You ARE toxic.
But you dont get it. there for you are hereby ignored..

> [{quoted}](name=MachstDuBierHase,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BV2bNcE9,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2018-11-14T10:27:57.137+0000)
>
> Or you could just remove every none-skilled element that triggers even the calmest people to get verba-- oh wait --"toxic"
> 
> JUST REMOVE THE BAD SH++ already and the game gets a ton of a lot more enjoyable.
> 
> People dont act out for no reason at all, there is a cause.
> Right now RiotGames deals with the result, never the rause.
> 
> And thats why "toxicity" as you claim it will never stop

It will never stop just like road rage will never stop. Im confident that the day we all drive autonomous cars there will still ha e road rage. 

It's a human conditioning that sees the world only through our own perspective.

> [{quoted}](name=Faneseeker,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BV2bNcE9,comment-id=0006000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-14T14:22:55.557+0000)
>
> It will never stop just like road rage will never stop. Im confident that the day we all drive autonomous cars there will still ha e road rage. 
> 
> It's a human conditioning that sees the world only through our own perspective.

As long as we have no physical (or digital in that case) proof that it would actually decline when the matchmaking gets reworked,
we can argue all we want about since both of us have different POV

You were actively harassing your teammates, and calling them toxic for not playing your way.
the world ain't spinnin round you.

> [{quoted}](name=breakordoom444,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BV2bNcE9,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-11-14T04:11:00.981+0000)
>
> You were actively harassing your teammates, and calling them toxic for not playing your way.
> the world ain't spinnin round you.

Technically.. The game does Spin around Midlane.
Therefor his Lane was the one the World spins around and he was in need of support or a gank
